and these descriptions inserted into me: Site code; see site info above (character)
Plot code; see site info above (character)
Identifier of individual sensor, tree, etc. being measured (character)
Spatial location; for TEMPEST, grid square (character)
Observed value (numeric). The no-data value is '[NA_STRING]'
Number of L1 values averaged to produce this L2 datum (integer). If zero and a value is present, linear interpolation was used to fill a short gap
Number of values dropped before averaging for being out of bounds, out of service, or failing QA/QC (integer)
Complete timeseries with mean annual cycle algorithm used for gaps, see quick start for detailed information
